info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 6:17PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Greenville and west central Spartanburg Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 617 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Spartanburg, or near Reidville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spartanburg, Duncan, Reidville, GSP Airport, Moore, Greer, Roebuck and Lyman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
